timeline.bodyText: There are other occurrences of waitForStringInLog("liberty_accesslog").  Do you need to change them all?

replies.bodyText: They did not appear in the test failure defect but I changed all the relevant ones (i.e. the ones that hit /metrics endpoint) just in case.
replies.author: jennifer-c
